item.title: Creating ncurses-like TUI Applications in Rust using Cursive
item.description: Introduction A post describing creating a TUI application in Rust for the Houseflow project. It enables triggering events, like turning on lights, on connected IoT devices. Goal The goal of this project is to create something similar to ncspot, a Spotify client in CLI that uses the cursive. Getting started The first step is to initialize an empty project cargo new --bin rust-blog-tui This will create a directory with the given name and few files inside.
